title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-7.13 - Cleaning service sinks
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-7.13 - Cleaning service sinks

State Regulations

At least one service sink or curbed cleaning facility
with a floor drain shall be provided and used for the cleaning of mops or
similar wet floor cleaning tools and for the disposal of mop water or similar
liquid wastes. Handwashing or warewashing facilities, or food preparation sinks
shall not be used for this purpose. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
